name: find_and_replace_in_all_thermal_zone_names
display_name: Find And Replace In All Thermal Zone Names

arguments.name: orig_string
arguments.display_name: Type the text you want search for in thermal zone names

arguments.name: new_string
arguments.display_name: Type the text you want to add in place of the found text

name_xml: Find And Replace In All Thermal Zone Names
modeler_description_xml: This can be used for any purposes but was originally made to be used with imported IDF files to restore the original thermal zone names from the IDF by removing " Thermal Zone" from the end of the name. That is why this is used as a default value, but it can be replaced with any text you would like to use.
description_xml: This measure will find and replace text in all thermal zone names. If the resulting name doesn't represent a unique thermal zone name it won't be changed. The search string must not be empty, but the replace string be empty.
